data.title: Associate Software Developer
content: Contributed to 2 GDPR-compliant cross-platform mobile applications serving 500+ daily active users, built across the full stack from database design to deployment.
Led a state management migration that eliminated redundant API calls and reduced duplicated state across 10+ screens, improving performance and long-term maintainability.
Delivered 10+ production-ready features end-to-end, including REST API design, database schemas, and technical documentation used by the wider development team.
Implemented security-critical features including data encryption, single-device login, mandatory password resets, and location-based controls to meet regulatory compliance requirements.

data.title: Junior Software Developer
content: Developed and maintained the company website and Third Storage Localhost, an open-source self-hostable backend-as-a-service platform used by developers worldwide.
Optimised core client-side functionality using advanced component lifecycle practices, reducing load times by 30%.
Integrated Redux for state management, cutting unnecessary re-renders by 25% and improving data flow consistency across the application.
Adopted TypeScript across the codebase to improve code quality, reduce runtime errors, and streamline collaboration within the team.

data.title: Software Developer Intern
content: Designed and built 20+ reusable UI components, improving design consistency and significantly accelerating front-end development velocity.
Wrote unit and integration tests that increased test coverage by 40% and reduced production regression bugs by 20%.

data.title: Web Development Intern
content: Contributed to the Smart India Hackathon 2022 platform, supporting secure idea submissions and evaluations for over 160,000 students at a national scale.
Built a responsive, cross-device UI that improved accessibility and reduced user drop-off by an estimated 25% during peak registration periods.
Implemented backend logic including role-based authentication to manage access for thousands of admin, evaluator, and participant accounts.
